name: Shrine: The Siege of Yueyuan
description: A storytelling game adapted from Genesis of Legends' Palanquin and based on Chinese xianxia fiction, mythology, religion, and history.  An idealistic Daoist. Six restless ghosts. A burning city under siege... and the Shrine that sits at the heart of it all!  (This game was originally released and only available as part of the "Our Shores: An RPGSEA Compilation" Kickstarter Stretch Goals.)
